outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
statusurl.comment: The url that provides the current compass mining facility status
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorGoodText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as good
colorMaintenance.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as maintenance
colorMaintenanceText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as maintenance
colorCritical.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as critical
colorCriticalText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as critical
colorMajor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as major
colorMajorText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as major
colorNone.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as none
colorNoneText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as none
colorMinor.comment: The color of the background expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as minor
colorMinorText.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier when a facility is listed as minor
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
